verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God is faithful

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: In a world of illusions and promises

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Where the truth is seldom what it seems

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: It’s so easy to be hardened by deceit

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: By the lies that be little and demean

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: But there’s one thing that we can be sure of

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: There’s a God who is upright and true

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: We can hold to the truth of God’s promise and know

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: What He said He will do, He will do

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: God is faithful, He is faithful

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: We have hope in His unfailing love

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: He is righteous, just, and pure

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: He’s the Maker of heaven, the earth and the sea

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: Steadfast, constant, unchanging is He

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: The God who by faith sets the captives free

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: Is faithful and His truth will forever endure

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: So when the world breaks a promise and deceives you

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: When you give your trust but others are untrue

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: You can still take hold of God’s promise and know what

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: He said He will do,

verse.name: v21
verse.lines:
He will
do.

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: Our God is faithful
